title: Software Engineer (IIoT/ C++/ Up to $8000)
description: About SchlumbergerWe are Schlumberger, the leading provider of technology and services to the energy industry. Throughout much of the oil and gas lifecycle in over 120 countries; we design, develop, and deliver technology and services that transforms how work is done. We define the boundaries of the industry by unleashing our talented people's energy. We're looking for innovators to join our diverse community of colleagues and develop new solutions and push the limits of what's possible. If you share our passion for discovery and want to find out what you could really do, then here is the place to do it.Software Engineer (C++ | Linux Programming)Location: BenoiCompany Transport Provided (Boon Lay)Salary Up to $8000 depending on experienceAWS + VBEssential Responsibilities and Duties  Responsible for designing and developing software solutions to enable connectivity and control of measurement devices in the Field, Edge as well as the Cloud.  Draws on a versatile background in Computer Science or Computer Engineering and extensive knowledge on C++ and C# programming languages, Windows and Linux application development, communication protocols and messaging systems.  Work in a software team to develop cloud based solutions to enhance the Digital Experience of remotely connected IIoT devices.Responsibilities  Build prototypes, products and systems suitable for testing, and set up and run lab simulations.  Develop and maintain high-quality software.  Stay current with the cutting edge in Internet of Things (IoT) related technologies.  Share expertise throughout the organization and provide user training for products.  Evaluate engineering approaches and risks to produce development plans that ensure high-quality, low-cost products and systems.  Author technical reports, papers, articles, patents and presentations.  Develop and maintain Azure DevOps release pipelinesRequirements  Fluent in C/C++, .NET C#, Windows programming, Linux programmingIf you possess relevant skillsets, do apply with an updated CV in word format.Apple Lim Pey Chyi – Apple.lim@manpower.com.sgPersonnel Reg No: R2090579EA Licence No: 02C3423Schlumberger is an equal employment opportunity employer. Qualified applicants are considered without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, disability, or other characteristics protected by law.

title: Security Software Engineer
description: JOB SUMMARY:Security Engineer (Consultant)Reporting to the security manager, you will be responsible for the development of software components that implements the security aspects for an e-payment solution using smart cards and HSM (hardware security module). You will be involved in the software development lifecycle from definition of requirements to design and development, and testing.Duties And Responsibilities: Design and develop frontend and backend security solutions for e-payment systems Works with multi-disciplinary team to understand system / application requirements As part of a team, develops software solutions that meets client’s needs and perform as designed Capable of applying technical best practices to all projects Consistently improves skills in order to deliver high-quality output and gainincreased responsibility Communicates professionally with clients and internal staff to identify needs andevaluate solutions Willingness to explore new technologies, learn new concepts and share ideas withothersKnowledge, Skills And Abilities: Experience handling multiple tasks while meeting deadlines Ability to thrive in a team development environment while also being able to workindependently Basic understanding of the benefits of the various design methodologies andobject-oriented environmentsTechnical Skills And Experience: Java, C++/C# and Visual Studio experience is required Recognised Degree in Electrical/Electronic Engineering/Computer Science or arelevant discipline At least 1-year experience in security software development Experience in Windows and UNIX environment Experience in cryptographic protocols and techniques (e.g. PKCS #11, one-wayhash function, MAC, digital signatures etc.); Experience in device authentication in industry sectors using card paymentsystems Experience in HSM, ISO 14443/APDU will be an added advantage Experience in security cryptography using AES/TDES algorithm and CA

title: Software Engineer (PSE)
description: As a member of PSE Design Tools Product Development Cell, you will design, develop and validate tools used by Technical Consultants, Customer Profile Center / Order Engineering developers and Indus users.A week in the life of a Software Development Engineer:  You will work closely with the Product Owner(s) to      understand the requirements and design our software keeping in mind User      eXperience, maintainability, robustness and performance.  You will design our software to answer to the      requirements and/or challenge them if they are unsound.  You will work in an Agile development environment and      be part of a Scrum team participating to Poker sessions, Sprint Planning,      Review, Retrospective and backlog refinement.  You will ensure the overall Quality of the product by      coordinating the validation of the product.  You will implement the design and unit test them.  You will write end-user guides and required      documentations.  You will provide Level 3 support to users of our      applications.Knowledge, Skills and Experience:  To succeed at this      job, you must have: good analytical capability and experienced in Java /      J2EE / Python development. Worked in an Agile development e.g. with Scrum      / Kanban.  It is also      required to have experience in Validation practices and testing      environment such as Robot Framework. You may also be familiar with      Continuous Integration/Continuous Delivery and DevOps.  You must be fluent in      English.  We would like      someone to join our team who is willing to learn, share, and is a good team player.  You must have a Degree in      Computer Science, Information Technology or Computer Engineering.  We are looking for      someone with     preferably 3 years of software      development experience, although fresh graduates are welcome too.

title: Software Engineer
description: Company OverviewKiteworks enables enterprise organizations to securely connect all their content to the people and systems that are part of their critical business processes, regardless of the applications that create that content or where it is stored, while maintaining the controls and visibility needed to demonstrate compliance. Kiteworks solutions have been used by more than 25 million end users and have been installed at more than 3,000 of the world’s leading corporations and government agencies including NYC Health + Hospitals; KPMG; Kaiser Permanente; Latham  Watkins; National Park Service; Umpqua Bank; Cargill; and the National Institute for Standards and Technology (NIST).PositionThe Software Engineer position is based in Singapore. We are looking for highly driven, talented and self-motivated Engineers to join a team of world-class engineers. Software Engineers would need skills to lead the development of any area of a large, scalable, distributed system or application. They would also work on the latest cutting-edge internet/software technology.Job Description:· Research solutions for technically challenging problems.  Participate in discussions with stakeholders to understand business and system requirements.  Perform technical tasks to develop and improve software application according to functional and      technical specifications.· Designing, building and maintaining large-scale, high availability backend services and infrastructure· Work and closely co-ordinate with QA during creation of test plans.Requirements:· Bachelors or higher in Computer Science, Computer Engineering  IT related fields or related technical discipline· 1 - 5 years experience, fresh graduate with relevant project/intern experiences may apply. · Excellent programming skills, experience with modern programming languages like python will be a plus· Proficient understanding of code versioning tools such as git· Hands on experience with Agile practices like Scrum and TDDDesired Skills:· Past experience in web and RESTful backend development with Python/Flask· Knowledge in PHP and Apache Airflow is a plus· Working experience in relational database technologies such as MySQL or MariaDB and NoSQL· Able to plan, carry out, report progress and accurately complete assigned tasks alone and in a team· Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as Git· Strong communication skills with clients and peer developers· Self-motivated and proactive, with demonstrated creative and critical thinking capabilities· Team player

title: Senior Software Engineer (Java/SIP)
description: As an industry leader and Software-as-a-Service provider our mission at 8x8, Inc. (NYSE:EGHT) is to transform the future of business communications. The 8x8 Open Communications Platform (TM) uniquely brings together Voice, Video, Collaboration, Contact Center, and enterprise-class API solutions, helping businesses across the globe transform their customer and employee experience, and empowering workforces worldwide to work smarter.For additional information, visit www.8x8.com, or follow 8x8 on LinkedIn, Twitter, and Facebook.We are looking for a talented software engineer to join our growing technology team to work on the Voice platform. This is an exciting opportunity to become a member of the 8x8 CPaaS Engineering team that is involved in the entire life cycle of development. You will be challenged with tasks related to concurrency, performance optimization and real time processing.Your responsibilities:- Code your ideas! Test, review, fix, deploy and celebrate.- Take part in design discussions, code reviewing and integrations testing- Conduct necessary research on new technologies, evaluate, prototype and plan improvements to the platform- Write technical specs for new services and conduct training sessions for other engineersDesired skills and experience:- A computer science degree or equivalent qualifications- 6+ years of professional software development experience- Strong background in design and implementation of RESTful APIs, reusable software components and scalable microservices and a good understanding of algorithms and data structures- Expert knowledge and experience coding in Java, object-oriented programming and design patterns- Good knowledge and experience working with SIP stack, SIP servers and other VoIP technologies- Think Multi-threaded! Knowledge of concurrency models and best practices- Knowledge in asynchronous programming, caching technologies (i.e. Redis), message queues (i.e. RabbitMq, Kafka), Java frameworks like Vertx.io or Akka.io, RDBMS, Docker and Kubernetes- Working knowledge of Linux, Git, SQL and CI tools- Experienced in agile methodologiesBeneficial skills and personality traits:- Fluency in English (both in writing and speaking) and great communication skills- Methodical, logical and well organized- Strong analytical  troubleshooting skills. Thrilled to solve problems- Self motivated, great team player and customer oriented- Passionate. Persistent. Creative- Enjoys dynamic working environmentsWorking at 8x8:+ Industry leading, award winning technology and recognised on two Gartner Magic Quadrants+ Inclusive, supportive and collaborative culture yet with a winning mentality+ Encouragement and environment to make a difference+ Deep passion for doing the best for our customers, giving them the best service and the best technology

title: Software Engineer, APAC
description: Roles  Responsibilitiesfoodpanda (small ‘f’) is the world’s favourite way to order food online from the comfort of your home or office. Whether it’s getting your hands on your favourite pasta, kebab or pizza, we believe that no one should have to suffer from hunger attacks ever again.However, this doesn’t happen without some really awesome people. We are looking for a Software Engineer to support our growing regional engineering team that is based in Singapore. You will be part of an international team of highly talented and motivated people.Skills:  Building the most efficient platform for on-demand food delivery, bleeding edge technical stack (ES6, React + Redux, Webpack)  Excellent knowledge of JavaScript (ES6+)  Proficient in React, knowledge of a modern React stack to handle side effects, styling, testing  Design Driven Development  Hexagonal Architecture  S.O.L.I.D. principles  Event-driven architecture  Knowledge or experience in Microservice architecture, Redis, Elasticsearch, SQL and key-value storage, AMQP. Kubernetes/Docker/Golang  Extensive experience in general purpose programming language  Experience working with distributed and parallel systems and web applications  Practical experience with Design Patterns, Design Principles, Software Architecture and Algorithms and automated tests (unit, integration and functional)  Good knowledge of relational databases (You should be aware of normal forms, ACID, isolation levels, index anatomy)  Design, develop, test, deploy, maintain and improve the software  Take part in architectural decision making  Understanding development lifecycle and collaborate with cross-functional and international agile teams  Experience with one or more of the following is an advantage but not a must-have: GitHub, AWS, ElasticSearch, Redis, MySQLRequired Experience:  Minimum 4 years of experience in software development.  Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or an equivalent education or practical experience.  Very good communication skills in English, both written and spokenTechnical Skill:  Knowledge and understanding but not a must have Symphony, Blackfire, Java, Node.js, Travis, Blazemeter and apiaryWhat We Offer:  A dynamic and challenging working environment  An extra steep learning curve  Responsibility from day one in a fast growing and global company  A vibrant and international team with a diverse background  Regular company and team events

You will be part of an international team of highly talented and motivated people.Skills:  Building the most efficient platform for on-demand food delivery, bleeding edge technical stack (ES6, React + Redux, Webpack)  Excellent knowledge of JavaScript (ES6+)  Proficient in React, knowledge of a modern React stack to handle side effects, styling, testing  Design Driven Development  Hexagonal Architecture  S.O.L.I.D. principles  Event-driven architecture  Knowledge or experience in Microservice architecture, Redis, Elasticsearch, SQL and key-value storage, AMQP. Kubernetes/Docker/Golang  Extensive experience in general purpose programming language  Experience working with distributed and parallel systems and web applications  Practical experience with Design Patterns, Design Principles, Software Architecture and Algorithms and automated tests (unit, integration and functional)  Good knowledge of relational databases (You should be aware of normal forms, ACID, isolation levels, index anatomy)  Design, develop, test, deploy, maintain and improve the software  Take part in architectural decision making  Understanding development lifecycle and collaborate with cross-functional and international agile teams  Experience with one or more of the following is an advantage but not a must-have: GitHub, AWS, ElasticSearch, Redis, MySQLRequired Experience:  Minimum 6 years of experience in software development.  Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or an equivalent education or practical experience.  Very good communication skills in English, both written and spokenTechnical Skill:  Knowledge and understanding but not a must have Symphony, Blackfire, Java, Node.js, Travis, Blazemeter and apiaryWhat We Offer:  A dynamic and challenging working environment  An extra steep learning curve  Responsibility from day one in a fast growing and global company  A vibrant and international team with a diverse background  Regular company and team events

title: Senior Software Engineer (Java BE)
description: We are looking for an experienced Senior Software Engineer (Java) in Singapore to make the team stronger.We Value  Value the individuals – We encourage and motivate people to grow. We perceive our people as a source of our success.  Strive for excellence – We strive for the highest standards of excellence and continuously learn. We take pride in our engineering and accomplishments.  Act as a team – We treat one another with respect and encourage the best ideas to come from anywhere within the organization. We value our diversity.  Focus on Customers – We build long term customer relationships, as we strive to always understand our customers' business and needs.  Act with integrity – We operate legally, honestly and ethically. We take responsibility for our actions.We Offer  Unique opportunity to work for challenging projects in a multinational team  Competitive compensation depending on experience and skills  Regular assessments and salary reviews  Free English classes and unlimited self-service trainings  Opportunities for self-realization  Friendly team and creative atmosphere  Flexible working schedule  Corporate and social eventsResponsibilities  Be a member of a cross-functional team that experiment with new technology and proactively searches for the best solutions and ideas in the marketplace  Plan, design and implement technical solutions that are scalable and resilient and futureproofed  Coordinate your work with other developers to deliver first-class technology solutions in a positive, fun, yet challenging and deadline driven environment  Work closely with business, scrum, delivery, technology and vendor teams balancing scope, time and cost  Adhere to software quality standards. Review Fortify, SonarQube and Nexus IQ reports and ensure closure by developers on time  Provide input on, follow and evangelize code quality guidelines and standards  Identify/troubleshoot application code-related issues, and review and provide feedback to any required final user documentationRequirements  Bachelor degree or above in Computer Science, Software Engineering or related majors  Minimum 5 years of relevant experience  Proficient in server-side languages and framework such as Java, Spring Boot and multi-threaded programming technologies  Hands on experience on Java, Sprint Boot, Spring cloud, Spring MVC frameworks, Hibernate  Experience with RESTFUL web services, API Gateway, Microservices Architecture, Event driven system and related technology stacks.  In depth understanding of different phases of software development lifecycle and understanding of Agile Scrum processes and tools such as JIRA, GitHub/Bitbucket, Maven, Jenkins, Confluence, Quality Center, etc  Knowledge of both Relational database (MySQL/MariaDB, SQL/Oracle) and NoSQL(MongoDB)  Hands-on experience with Test Driven Development (TDD) using Junit, Mockito.  A team player who possesses good interpersonal, communication skills and ability to work independently and be able to coordinate technical discussion and activities with global and offshore teams  Good interpersonal skills, analytical mind, get things done attitude, and passion for engineering excellence  Willingness and ability to adapt to changes in priorities and requirements  Active learner who is passionate about technology and keeps up to date with technology changesDesirable  Knowledge of the Cloud Platform like AWS, GCP or similar will be an advantage.  Experience with cloud-based java application development  Professional certifications in any of the Programming Languages  Experience in building and running containerized microservices for Kubernetes/Cloud environment

title: Software Engineer
description: About UsONEPIP, founded in 2012, is a foreign exchange and payments financial technology company with subsidiaries in Singapore, Hong Kong and Kuala Lumpur. Licensed as a Major Payment Institution by the Money Authority of Singapore (MAS), it operates the ONEPIP Exchange and BidAsk platforms for various client segments based in the Asia-Pacific region.About The RoleAsk yourself - do you have the passion to build, design and develop scalable, high performance software solutions? Do you enjoy delivering systems that push the boundaries of current industry offerings? Can you own a problem, and drive it to the finishing point? Can you on short notice pack up your multi-core high performance laptop and fly into another global financial centre and strut your stuff?We are looking for one such talented Software Engineer who is highly dependable, motivated, and dynamic. As a fintech financial institution, we operate and continue to enhance OPX App/ OPX Web/ OPX Trader / BidAsk, various payments and settlement platform that cater all kind of foreign exchange payment functions we developed from zilch to the robust high availability system it is today.All our in-house developed systems provide opportunities for innovation, enhancement and problem solving. It is necessary to work closely with the team as development of this infrastructure presents many technical challenges in the areas of large data computation with high-performance computing. You are required to deliver quality source code, create technical documents and work with peers on end-to-end testing for quality assurance procedures. The focus is on improving system quality, enhancing applications,  maintaining and improving existing codebases.  When needed, you will perform RD on new technology and can make recommendation to future product development.Requirements:  Candidate must possess at least Bachelor’s Degree/Post Graduate Diploma / Professional Degree in Computer Science/Information Technology or equivalent.  At least 1 Year working experience in the related field is required for this position  Minimum 1 Year of experience in complete software development life cycle (SDLC) for web application design, development, and maintenance.  Knowledge of algorithms and data structures  Strong analytical and reasoning skills with an ability to visualize processes and outcomes  Proficiency in troubleshooting software issues and debugging a large codebase  Good English written and verbal communication skills.  Required skills: Bootstrap CSS 3 above, HTML, Javascript (JQuery,Angular,AngularJS), .Net SOAP, .Net Restful Web API Services  Experience with any version control system  Good to have skills: ASP.net MVC 5, .Net Framework 4.0 above, .Net Core Framework 3.1 above, Entity Framework 6, SQL Database 2017 above, Cloud Services (AWS), Mobile cross-platform implementation (i.e.: Xamarin, ReactNative)We regret that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.

title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Who are we looking for:Here at Hubble, we pride ourselves in having passionate Software Engineers who build highly usable, feasible, and valuable products. We are looking for independent and self-driven individuals who embrace challenges and love to explore new technologies and platforms. At Hubble, we believe the future is in our products, and the future of our products will be in your hands.What Hubble will give you:Hubble is built by a team of talented, driven, and ambitious individuals. We do not subscribe to conventions. We do not let history and traditions dictate and limit our dreams to shape the world. We adopt the same mindset with our hiring. We are looking for the best and we want to bet on you. We will give you all the exposure and resources you need to grow into the role of a Software Engineer.Hubble will also provide you with the following:  Flexibility of working from home  Personal company laptop  Best leave entitlement  Attractive rewards  Superb Employee Culture  Genuine career progression opportunities  Global transfer opportunitiesWho will you be working with:If you connect with any of the description below, please apply immediately:  Purpose driven  Hungry, ambitions, and self-motivated  Meritocratic, results/performance  age/bureaucracy  Resourceful, independent, chart our own destiny  Determined, perseverance, and hard working  Creative, innovative, out of the boxYes, the above is everyone of us at Hubble.What you will be doing:  Developing a clean and maintainable code using software engineering best-practices and modern platforms.  Participating in a full product development lifecycle from ideation to live production.  Day-to-day tech operations such as server maintenance and deployment.What we need from you:  At least 6 years of experience  Have a good understanding of web application architecture  Have a good understanding of various software engineering design patterns  Experience in one or more of these frameworks: Ruby on Rails, ReactJS, and React Native will be advantageous  Experience in building mobile applications or web applications will be advantageous  Comfortable with working in a fast-paced environment and highly collaborative team to solve real business problems  Versatility and enthusiasm to tackle new problems across the full-stack and to learn new frameworks as we continue to push technology forwardAbout Hubble:Hubble is a leading technology company focusing on the construction and engineering industry. We are on a mission to build the world’s first autonomous construction sites by automating and trading the 4M (Man, Machine, Material, Money) resources.Our solutions help digitise all your work processes, and connect all key project stakeholders - developers, consultants, fabricators, contractors, and facility managers - onto an all-in-one platform - The Hubble Platform.Build faster and cheaper and with the highest quality and safety standards with Hubble’s impactful technologies. Let’s transform the way we build our cities for a better tomorrow. Today. Together. For generations to come.Visit us at hubble.build to learn more for #bettercitiesoftomorrow

title: Senior Software Engineer (Android)
description: ResponsibilitiesThis is a mobile software engineering position in which you will be joining a small team of engineers to help develop software projects that provide the best experience for gamers. In this role you will be responsible for the design and implementation of code and oversee test automation for your project(s). As part of the engineering team, you will also assist with other development processes and requirements as needed.  Work closely with product management and design teams to Design, develop, and implement innovative applications on the mobile / cross platform and create tools, unit tests, test scripts, test harnesses, and other infrastructure for validating mobile / cross platform applications, libraries  Take ownership over test automation, including designing or customizing automation tools as needed  Develop feature code and support other engineering efforts when not working on test-based deliverables  Quickly translate technical requirements and product goals into appropriate code and automated tests  Work with the QC team to help design test plans and support testing tools and processes  Manage continuous integration tools like Jenkins, Xcode Server, and VS Build Server to help manage test targets, create reports, and support other users of the tools  Participate in creating technical specifications and performing code reviews with other engineers  Participate in agile planning and scope estimation for team projects  Generate and maintain documentation as needed  Contribute best-in-class programming skills to develop highly innovative, high–performance, consumer-facing products  Additional duties as assignedRequirements  Engineering talent proven by exceptional work experience, hobby projects, open source contributions, and/or superior academic results  5+ years of experience in software development and a strong command of object-oriented principles across multiple languages (C, C++, and Java a must), other languages (like Kotlin, Swift, objective C, C#, Python and Ruby) a bonus  Experience in React Native, Flutter and cross platform application development is a bonus  Knowledge of Android design/development best practices, and experience with Android Studio  Knowledge of iOS design/development best practices, and experience with XCode  Deep knowledge of layout and design principles (graphics, responsive layouts, animation, typography, etc.)  Significant experience with unit level testing, writing test plans, scripts and generating testable code  Extensive experience using common SCM/RCS tools like SVN, GIT, Mercurial, etc.  Extensive experience working with common bug tracking tools like JIRA, Bugzilla, Trac, Mantis, etc.  Experience managing testing via continuous integration software like Jenkins, Xcode Server, and VS Build Server  Experience working in an agile or lean software development environment  Deep hands-on technical expertise and problem-solving skills  Strong English-language communication (verbal and written) and documentation skills  Enjoys working in a collaborative, technically challenging environment with rapidly changing requirements  A scrappy, self-motivated, entrepreneurial attitude that gets high-quality projects done quickly

title: SENIOR SOFTWARE ENGINEER
description: Responsibilities:  Perform and manage software development activities      including requirements gathering and analysis, planning, systems design,      development and implementation, documentation, testing and deployment.  Participate and manage in all areas of the software      development lifecycle from requirements definition to deployment.  Document and demonstrate solutions by developing      documentation, flowcharts, wireframes, diagrams, charts, UI/UX, code      comments and code reviews.  Recommend and      evaluate detailed design of system components/libraries to ensure      reusability and flexibility is practiced, where applicable.  Develop and Implement the software in accordance to      the coding standards and design patterns specified in the design document  Debug, troubleshoot and resolve bugs and complex      issues.  Research and      evaluate new software technology stacks for project and product      development.  Report to and coordinate closely with Team      Lead / Project Manager for projects deliverables.  Provide operational support, ongoing      maintenance and enhancement.  Provide guidance to junior engineers.Requirements  Bachelor’s degree      with solid programming skills in C# is highly desired.  Strong working      knowledge on Microsoft technologies like .Net, service-oriented      architecture, Entity Framework, nHibernate, ASP.NET, WPF, WCF and MS SQL.  Strong OOP      design experience.  Working experience      in healthcare domain, HL7, DICOM is a plus.  Working knowledge      on cloud DevOps  Familiarity with      software design patterns, such as MVC and MVVM.  Able to work      independently with minimum supervision.  Experience with      Python or React would be advantageous.  A good      innovative team player with strong sense of integrity  accountability.  Great      communication skills.  Must have      willingness to learn new technologies.  Excellent      problem solving and analytical thinking skills.What we offer:  An attractive remuneration package will      commensurate your experience and qualification.  Work      with a team who are generous in knowledge sharing, friendly, smart,      passionate, and funny too.  Business      casual dress throughout the week.  Professional training      opportunities. We believe learning is a lifelong journey. We offer everyone      the internal and external training opportunity to grow employee’s technical      skills.

title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Involved in Software Design, Development, Unit testing and deployment of the application, successfully into production environments.  Having sound knowledge on the following PEGA PRPC design and implementation topics: (Work Object Relationships, Specialization techniques, Reporting, Routing (Skills based), Rule Resolution/ Inheritance/ Circumstancing, Class Design, Locking, Persistence, Authentication, Agents, Functions/Java API, Services, Connectors, Security and Access controls).  Must have relevant PEGA Certifications  Provide cross-segment/ cross domain BPM (Business Process Management) and BRE (Business Rules Engine) guidance, technological recommendation and transition strategies that support the design, development and implementation of initiatives based on common delivery and agility for complex and/or multiple projects.  Designing  implementing innovative and out-of-the-box solutions for complex Business problems.  Implementing the user interfaces, business logic and flow design based on the user stories and clarify the ambiguities if exists with the business analysts.  Participating in sprint planning, stand-up calls, sprint retrospection meetings and actively involved in the grooming the sprint backlog.  Debugging  unit testing the software application using the Pega tools like clipboard, tracer and Pega logs.  Quality Governance and ensure team are adhering to development best practices and configuration that is Pega guardrail compliant.  Review the work of others, providing guidance and support to fellow team members.  Communicating solution options to business owners/stakeholders, Architecture review boards and implementing the Proof of Concepts for the application.  Developing software applications which ensures alignment with enterprise technology standards (e.g. solution patterns, application frameworks, technology roadmaps, capital plans)  Developing  implementing all project deliverables on scope, time with highest levels of quality and ensuring to eliminate the defect leakage into different environments like UAT, SIT production.  Maintaining awareness of current technology assets and the capability of each with Proof of Concepts.  Reviews alert logs to ensure quality standards Runs pre-flight, DB tracer and Performance Analyzer to insure performance and quality of the application.  Sound knowledge on agile (SCRUM/Pega Smart BPM) Software Development project lifecycle.  Writing up reports, manuals and other documentation on the status, operation and maintenance of software.

title: Software Engineer
description: Responsibilities:1) Software Developmenta) Be a Scrum development team member;  Ability to collaborate with team effectively  Able to support storyboarding effort of the team  Capability to contribute in all phases of the development cycleb) Develop and enhance applications;  Development activities are expected to be carried out with minor supervision  Able to deliver working software on time  Able to design and develop high quality code as per standards and guidelinesc) Peer-Review of code;  Can perform peer-review to ensure code quality and requirements are met2) Software Supporta) Support SIT and UAT activities;  Able to assist smooth delivery of software to SIT and UAT environmentsb) Provide support for production;  Capable to fix assigned bugs quickly • Able to update status and work details in Bug/Issue Tracking SystemRequirements:  Candidate must possess at least Bachelor's Degree/Post Graduate Diploma/Professional Degree in Computer Science/Information Technology or equivalent.  Minimum of 3 years of experience in software development  Possessing any of the certifications or equivalent would be an added advantage a) Certified JAVA Developer b) Certified Scrum Developer (CSD)  Strong analytical skills, able to solve complex problem  Good knowledge and implementation of REST APIs  Knowledge of Agile and Scrum  Experience with modern web technologies, HTML5, CSS3  Experience with Javascript and frontend frameworks e.g. Angular  Experience with JDK 1.5 and above, J2EE and Spring, Hibernate framework, Grails/Groovy  Knowing C, C++ and C# is advantageous  Experience with J2EE application servers GlassFish, Jetty or equivalent  Working with Databases – MySQL, Oracle, SQL Server or equivalent  Knowledge of Design Patterns e.g. MVC  Familiar with source control management system such as SVN, GIT or equivalent.  Familiar with usage of bug tracking system such as BugZilla, JIRA or equivalent.  Experience with mobile hybrid development as well as native e.g. Cordova/Phonegap

title: Software Engineer – Developer Experience & Tooling #182031
description: Description As part of the role, your responsibilities include:  Assist in software architecture design and deployment methodologies within the Credit-Suisse IT landscape.  Complete engineering tasks to improve developer experience for Credit-Suisse APAC IT.  Design, develop, deploy and support automation tools needed to provide an excellent customer experience.  Keep up to date with the newest technologies in the field and drive adoption at Credit-Suisse.  Engage with operations to ensure smooth transition and operational alignment with the CS banking business strategy for product delivery.  Coordinate with development teams and support organizations to build sustainable product architectures, software deployment methods, new metric and reporting techniques, and accurate capacity plans.  Assist in transforming our organization towards an engineering culture.  Seek to ensure high availability and security of all products.  Coordinate with multi-functional technology teams to mature infrastructure projects and software development life-cycle by applying industry standard methodologies.  Contribute to a robust infrastructure architecture/support team that complements software developers in delivering highly available solutions for internal and external customers  Develop and document workflows and processes, as well as improving/automating them.  Work directly with software engineers on development projects related to fixes and/or improvements in tools or end products as necessary.  Technical-documentation and knowledge base artifacts for production and end user issues related to web based products.Your future colleaguesThe APAC Technology and Change organization is responsible for the engineering and support of technology solutions, implementation of change programs, and the associated change, design and data governance for the APAC Division. The department encompasses the APAC Private Banking (PB), APAC Trading Solutions IT and Product IT organizations, together with integrated cross-divisional divisional capabilities for Project Portfolio Management and GovernanceQualifications You are expected to possess the below:  Strong programming experience in Golang or Python  Experience with Linux environment. Solid grasp of TCP/IP.  Experienced in common scripting tools (bash,etc.)  Understanding of microservice architecture and experience in building RESTful Service.  Solid Experience with Docker  Kubernetes is must have.  Deployment automation and orchestration tools (Ansible/Puppet/Chef/Salt).  Living and breathing infrastructure as code (Experience with Terraform is a plus).  Good understanding of Maven/Gradle/npm build system.  Understanding of the importance metrics and alerting. Experience with modern monitoring tools (InfluxDB, Prometheus ,Grafana etc.).  Experience with SQL/NoSQL/Caches/KV stores (Etcd/Consul/Redis/Hazelcast/Mongo, etc.)  CI build tools (GitLab CI/Jenkins/TeamCity, etc.)  Experience with Public Cloud as well as Continuous Delivery process is a plus.  Experience with Service Mesh Technology (Linkerd/Istio) is a plus.  Contribution to Open Source is a plus.

Quality  Governance and ensure team are adhering to development best practices and  configuration that is Pega guardrail compliant.  Review the work  of others, providing guidance and support to fellow team members.  Communicating  solution options to business owners/stakeholders, Architecture review boards and implementing the Proof of Concepts for the application.  Developing software applications which ensures alignment with enterprise technology standards (e.g. solution patterns, application frameworks, technology roadmaps, capital plans)  Developing   implementing all project deliverables on scope, time with highest levels of quality and ensuring to eliminate the defect leakage into different environments like UAT, SIT production.  Maintaining awareness of current technology assets and the capability of each with Proof of Concepts.  Reviews alert logs to ensure quality standards Runs pre-flight, DB tracer and Performance Analyzer to insure performance and quality of the application.  Sound knowledge on agile (SCRUM/Pega Smart BPM) Software Development project lifecycle.  Writing up reports, manuals and other documentation on the status, operation and maintenance of software.

title: Senior Software Engineer (Android)
description: ResponsibilitiesThis is a mobile software engineering position in which you will be joining a small team of engineers to help develop software projects that provide the best experience for gamers. In this role you will be responsible for the design and implementation of code and oversee test automation for your project(s). As part of the engineering team, you will also assist with other development processes and requirements as needed.  Work closely with product management and design teams to Design, develop, and implement innovative applications on the mobile / cross platform and create tools, unit tests, test scripts, test harnesses, and other infrastructure for validating mobile / cross platform applications, libraries  Take ownership over test automation, including designing or customizing automation tools as needed  Develop feature code and support other engineering efforts when not working on test-based deliverables  Quickly translate technical requirements and product goals into appropriate code and automated tests  Work with the QC team to help design test plans and support testing tools and processes  Manage continuous integration tools like Jenkins, Xcode Server, and VS Build Server to help manage test targets, create reports, and support other users of the tools  Participate in creating technical specifications and performing code reviews with other engineers  Participate in agile planning and scope estimation for team projects  Generate and maintain documentation as needed  Contribute best-in-class programming skills to develop highly innovative, high–performance, consumer-facing products  Additional duties as assignedRequirements  Engineering talent proven by exceptional work experience, hobby projects, open source contributions, and/or superior academic results  5+ years of experience in software development and a strong command of object-oriented principles across multiple languages (C, C++, and Java a must), other languages (like Kotlin, Swift, objective C, C#, Python and Ruby) a bonus  Experience in React Native, Flutter and cross platform application development is a bonus  Knowledge of Android design/development best practices, and experience with Android Studio  Knowledge of iOS design/development best practices, and experience with XCode  Deep knowledge of layout and design principles (graphics, responsive layouts, animation, typography, etc.)  Significant experience with unit level testing, writing test plans, scripts and generating testable code  Extensive experience using common SCM/RCS tools like SVN, GIT, Mercurial, etc.  Extensive experience working with common bug tracking tools like JIRA, Bugzilla, Trac, Mantis, etc.  Experience managing testing via continuous integration software like Jenkins, Xcode Server, and VS Build Server  Experience working in an agile or lean software development environment  Deep hands-on technical expertise and problem-solving skills  Strong English-language communication (verbal and written) and documentation skills  Enjoys working in a collaborative, technically challenging environment with rapidly changing requirements  A scrappy, self-motivated, entrepreneurial attitude that gets high-quality projects done quickly

title: C++ Algorithm Software Engineer, Semantic Maps
description: About this positionWe are looking for talented C++ Algorithm Software Engineers who are enthusiastic about building core software and infrastructure for mapping. You will focus on developing optimized solutions to our semantic map services. Our services include point cloud labelling, automated map annotations and map change detection.What You'll Be Doing  Design and implement optimized algorithms to build semantic maps  Work with point cloud, image and other sensor data to aid in semantic map building  Design and implement algorithms to detect map changes across different map versions using both raw sensor data and map data  Work with internal teams that focus on HD mapping applications and Computer Vision/Machine Learning models (e.g. SLAM, segmentation networks, object detection networks) to improve our semantic maps  Understand how the maps are consumed and design metrics and tools to evaluate and validate our automated annotationsWhat We're Looking For  Degree in Computer Engineering, Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, Robotics or related fields  Solid programming skills and software engineering practices  Knowledge of modern C++ is a must  Solid understanding of data structures and algorithms relevant to mapping  Solid understand of probability, geometry and linear algebra  Strong communication, problem-solving, task-prioritization and teamwork skills  Experience in geometric computer vision, point cloud processing or scene reconstructionBonus Points (not required)  Experience in working with large and scalable systems is a plus  Experience with Docker and Jenkins  Experience with working with Machine Learning models. More specifically, integrating machine learning modules, whether by TensorRT or TorchJIT, into production.  Experience in building databases for neural network training.  Industry-level experience with autonomous vehicle software, automotive software, mapping applications, HD Maps, lidar data, and/or geospatial data

title: Software Engineer React.JS/Fullstack
description: Here at Marvable, our mission is to create a comfortable space for everyone to work better in the ever-increasingly dynamic world, working at our best productivity. As a full stack developer, your main responsibility is to build robust and scalable software solutions. You have the opportunity to participate in the full software development life cycle, from conception to development and deployment. You will help and contribute to the design and overall architecture of the application.What you'll be doing:  Develop applications that effectively accomplish business objectives and user needs;  Design and write code for applications and maintain applications databases;  Proficient in both front end and back end development;  Adopting and practicing Agile methodology;  Analyze and edit existing software applications to improve and optimise functionality as well as to fix any existing bugs;  Remodel and adapt applications as needed to optimise performance;  Test applications extensively to ensure they are error and bug free;  Engage relevant stakeholders and business users to understand business processes;  Communicate with relevant internal technical stakeholders to obtain information on project limitations, performance requirements and timeline;  Maintain and update library of modules, components and tools;  Deliver project in time, taking ownership and responsibility for the design and development;  Review technical design, perform code reviews and functional and technical documentations.What we are looking for:  Min Diploma/Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science or related  At least 2 years in full-stack development, Software Engineering, Software Development, or related work experience  Strong foundations in Javascript, HTML, CSS (ReactJS is a must have)  Solid knowledge in NoSQL databases (eg. MongoDB)  Experience with web services (Soap, Restful)  Experience with backend framework (eg. NodeJS, Java, Ruby on Rails, .NET)  Experience with frontend framework (eg. Bootstrap)Superpower required from you:  You love to challenge yourself to achieve better results and constantly improve;  Task-oriented and ability to work in a fast-paced environment;  Solid ability in both written and verbal communication;  Process and solutions thinking, with a passion for design and technology;  A high degree of independent judgement;  Able to solve complex problems;  Proactive with a strong sense of responsibility and ownership.

title: Lead Software Engineer
description: Life at  Grab:At Grab, every Grabber is guided by The Grab Way, which spells out our mission, how we believe we can achieve it, and our operating principles - the 4Hs: Heart, Hunger, Honour and Humility. These principles guide and help us make decisions as we work to create economic empowerment for the people of Southeast Asia.Get to know our TeamThe payments team is responsible for building safe, secure and high throughput payments primitives. We own a range of platform primitive components such as, but not limited to, Wallet Homepage, Transaction History, Card issuing, Payment Gamification experience and so on. We take pride in building distributed systems that have a real impact on the lives of millions of users in our endeavour to out-serve the underserved population. Theories like Idempotency, CAP theorem, Distributed Consensus are more than just theoretical terms for us and have real bearings on the systems we build.Get to know the RoleWe are seeking passionate developers with the required skillsets and then some, to join our team. In this role, you will have opportunities to design, develop, and maintain backend components and services. Not only will you get to collaborate with the product, business, and program management teams to be on top of your deliverables. You will also pick up the software engineering practices for larger teams: code reviews, ample use of static analysis, prolific feature-flagging, semantic versioning of internal APIs, and more. If you are willing to go the extra mile to identify and fix our users' paint points, apply with us today.The day-to-day activities:  Design and write with the cutting edge GO language to improve the availability, scalability, latency, and efficiency of Grab's range of services  Work with engineering team to explore and create new design / architectures geared towards scale and performance  Participate in code and design reviews to maintain our high development standards  Engage in service capacity and demand planning, software performance analysis, tuning and optimization  Collaborate with product and experience teams to define and prototype feature specifications  Work closely with infrastructure team in building and scaling back-end services as well as performing root cause analysis investigations  Design, build, analyze and fix large-scale systems  Learn full stack performance tuning and optimization  Debug and modify complex, production softwareThe must haves:  A degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, Information Technology or related fields  8+ years of experience in software engineering in a distributed systems environment  Strong Computer Science fundamentals in algorithms and data structures  Familiarity with running large scale web services; understanding of systems internals and networking are a plus  Strong understanding of system performance and scaling  Possess excellent communication, sharp analytical abilities with proven design skills, able to think critically of the current system in terms of growth and stability  You can be a good coder in any language (C++, C, Java, Scala, Rust, Haskell, OCaml, Erlang, Python, Ruby, PHP, Node.JS, C# etc.), but willing to work on GolangTech StackOur core services tech stack consists of Golang with Redis, MySQL, DynamoDB, Elasticsearch data stores as well as HAProxy load balancers. They all run on the AWS cloud infrastructure with auto-scaling abilities.We use GitHub for our code repository and we adhere to the basic Continuous Delivery tenets utilising a host of tools to support our release pipeline and code quality. These include Travis CI, New Relic, PullReview, Code Climate, Papertrail, Gemnasium, JFrog and Jenkins.Get to know Grab:Grab is more than just the leading ride-hailing and mobile payments platform in Southeast Asia. We use data and technology to improve everything from transportation to payments and financial services across a region of more than 620 million people. We work with governments, drivers, passengers, merchants, and the community, to solve critical problems in Southeast Asia.Grab began as a taxi-hailing app in 2012, but we have since extended our product platform to include GrabCar, GrabShare, GrabBike, GrabHitch, GrabExpress, GrabFood, GrabCoach, GrabShuttle, GrabCycle. We recently launched our fintech platform – GrabFinancial, which consists of payments, lending and insurance. Our latest addition is GrabVentures, an in-house incubation platform. We are focused on pioneering new commuting and payment alternatives for drivers and passengers with an emphasis on convenience, safety, and reliability. Currently, we offer services in 8 countries. Our RD offices are in Singapore, Seattle, Beijing, Bangalore, Jakarta and Vietnam. We aspire to unlock the true potential of Southeast Asia and look for like-minded individuals to join us on this ride.If you share our vision of driving South East Asia forward, apply to join our team today.We are committed to building diverse teams and creating an inclusive workplace that enables all Grabbers to perform at their best, regardless of nationality, ethnicity, religion, age, gender identity or sexual orientation and other attributes that make each Grabber unique.About GrabGrab is the leading superapp platform in Southeast Asia, providing everyday services that matter to consumers. Today, the Grab app has been downloaded onto millions of mobile devices, giving users access to over 9 million drivers, merchants, and agents. Grab offers a wide range of on-demand services in the region, including mobility, food, package and grocery delivery services, mobile payments, and financial services across 428 cities in eight countries.Join us today to drive Southeast Asia forward, together.

title: Software Engineer
description: Our team is working on CAPE, a CNCF approved cloud native tool, that provides multi-Kubernetes cluster application deployment and disaster recovery.We are on the lookout for software engineers who1. Enjoy solving technical challenges that come with delving deeper into cloud native development2. Are excited to learn how to program advanced Kubernetes operations example: Kubernetes operators3. Have the drive to bring excellent solutions to market4. Enjoy being a part of the latest cloud native ecosystem and communityPreferably, you would have relevant recent experience and have worked for at least 4 years. Beyond formal credentials, we are seeking talented people with the heart and the self-drive to grow. If you have participated in hackathons, start-up product builds, open-source software projects or technology communities, we want to hear from you.As a new technology company, it is a fast-paced environment with a healthy balance between independent contribution and collaboration. An international community of experienced and emerging talent, we make it a point to get to know each other as people, recognizing relationships are the bedrock for better work and collective brilliance. You can expect competitive compensation, a results-oriented work environment and work-lifebalance.ABOUT BIQMINDBiqmind enables companies to build solutions rapidly and run them anywhere. We offer leading-edge technologies to companies that want to harness the same competitive technology edge used by disruptors to deliver rapid innovation but are constrained by lack of expertise or in-house resources. Our software, enablement services and hardware can be applied across industries where there is a need to cost-effectively extend, converge and build solutions rapidly.Based in Singapore, we are an international team of passionate change makers with diverse experience across development, commercial and operations. As a new technology company, it is a fast-paced environment with a healthy balance between independent contribution and collaboration. Learn more about how Biqmind helps companies accelerate scalable solution delivery and do more with less at www.biqmind.com.ROLE DESCRIPTIONResponsibilities:• Build, maintain, and evolve core libraries, services, and/or platforms• Build and operate scalable, fault tolerant, distributed systems• Utilize cloud-based solutions• Research and implement innovative solutions which can increase the value of Biqmind products• Ensure that the Software Definition of Done is adhered to when delivering User Stories• Participate in Scrum or related Agile process and ensure the rules are adhered to• Address complex architectural problems with simple, intuitive design• Compile and write documentation related to program development• Train users to work with our products or systems• Any related other duties that we reasonably require you to undertakeREQUIREMENTS• Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering or related discipline• Strong problem-solving skills• Expert level understanding of engineering development processes and working environments including Scrum, XP, Kanban, Lean etc.• Hands-on experience with full stack development• Experience with Golang, JavaScript, React, Databases, Storage  REST• Experience with Docker, Kubernetes, Linux OS• Operational experience running API services at scale• Strong architecture skills for web applications• Experience with version control tools and continuous deploymentPersonal Attributes:• Excellent interpersonal, analytical, communication and written and verbal English Language skills• Ability to interact positively, clearly and professionally with peers• Flexible, open-minded, self-motivated, quick learner, initiative, reliable and a team player• Ability to multi-task, prioritize activities, work independently and calmly under pressure• Ability to adapt and thrive with changes in techniques and tools• Comfortable collaborating across teams and contributing to open source

title: Network Software Engineer
description: We are growing the Network Engineering Team and looking for high- performing Network Software Engineers to automate our network processes to support our customers in the ASEAN region.  Analyses internal and external user requirements  Writes and tests codes, refining and rewriting it as necessary and to communicate with any programmers involved in the appropriate projects  Researches, designs and write new software or kernel programs  Develops existing programs by analysing and identifying areas for modification  Integrates existing software products and incompatible platforms to work together  Creates technical specifications  Writes systems to control the scheduling of jobs or to control the access allowed to users or remote systems  Writes operational documentation with technical authors  Maintains systems by monitoring and correcting software defects  Works closely with other staff, such as project managers, graphic artists, UX designers, other developers, systems analysts and sales and marketing professionals  Consults clients and colleagues concerning the maintenance and performance of software systems, with a view to writing or modifying current operating systems  Investigates new technologies  Continually updates technical knowledge and skills by attending in-house and external courses, reading manuals and accessing new applications.  Understands the 7 layers of OSI with respect to fault-tolerant distributed systems and databases that support virtual machines, virtual storage devices, and virtual networks.Requirements1. Preferably in the industry of info-communications and technology or system integration or telecommunications.2. Preferably with minimum 3 years’ coding experience in a 7 layer OSI network environment;3. Experience in writing HAL (hardware Abstraction Layer) is advantageous with in-depth knowledge in Ethernet, TCP/IP and Network stack4. Proficent in xML, web and java technologies5. Superior communication, presentation and influencing power at all levels of the organization in particular, at least a B4 grade in O’Levels or N'Levels english.6. Degree in Telecommunications or Information Technology.7. Must be willing to travel from time to time; experience in ASEAN region is preferred.8. Must be willing to work after office hours or weekends to ensure that customers' requests are met.9. Ability to work under high pressure, multi-tasking and fast paced environment.

title: Senior Software Engineer, Drive Test Systems Engineering
description: About our group:  The Test Systems Engineering group is a global team focused on the ongoing development of Seagate’s Drive Test Systems. As part of Equipment Development Engineering, we ensure that our back-end drive test equipment development is aligned to the product roadmap, and operates as efficiently  securely as possible to deliver Seagate drives at the quality our customers demand, in the volumes that they need.About the role - you will:  Be part of a small team of software engineers that are responsible primarily to develop, optimize  maintain the control software that underpins the function of all Drive Test Equipment, in particular the Host/CM software  Assist with the transition from a CentOS-6.10 platform to the latest Linux release from RedHat/Oracle  Incorporate new features/functionality into Host/CM software that drives improved performance  Provide ongoing support to End Users  Business Partners for Test System setup  configurationAbout you:  Good software development skills  Proficiency in Python programming  Possess knowledge of C++ / Java Development Experience  Script development in Python as well as object-oriented Python  Good communication  documentation skills, with the flexibility to engage with teams in other locations in joint development work across multiple timezones  Understanding of Linux RPMs; creating and installing  Understanding of JIRA and GIT  Experience writing end-user documentationYour experience includes:  Linux knowledgeable; preferably CentOS / RHEL / Oracle  General networking knowledge and familiarity with Linux networking tools  Knowledgeable in LDAP concepts, user account management and authentication  Trusted Platform Module (TPM)  Puppet (system configuration management tool; setting up a Puppet master and writing Puppet code)  Knowledgeable in continuous integration tools  Knowledgeable in building kickstart  installationLocation:  Our Woodlands site is one of the largest electronics manufacturing sites in Singapore, housing our recording media operations. Spread over three sites, it is easily accessible via bus or from the MRT Station, with many employees taking mass-transportation to work. Ample free on-site parking is also available. Here at work you can enjoy breakfast, lunch, dinner and snacks at our on-site canteen and coffee shop. We offer a range of facilities including an in-house gym and dance studio, as well as after-work badminton and table tennis competitions. On-site celebrations and community volunteer opportunities also abound. Don’t miss our Lunar New Year Lion Dance performance or our Seagate’s Got Talent event.

title: Automation Design/Software Engineer
description: Responsibilities Define  functional requirement for projects design, configure and implement  control systems of software which include development, commissioning and  testing of  Control and Monitoring System, e.g. DCS, Ship Management  System.Able to execute design as per Contractual Requirement and in compliance to relevant authority's requirements.Involve in Design Review and Integration Reviews (IRs) with customer and different equipment vendors.Liaise with customer and internal team members to ensure good co-ordination, planning and meeting project schedule.Develop Hardware and Software Design Specifications and other Software/Test documentation.Coordinate and manage factory testing in company premises and testing at onboard vesselResponsible for integration of both hardware and software work as well as implementationHandle application programme change management, hardware deployment management and documentation.Implantation of PLC/SCADA project from concept to design and programmingInterface with SCADA  PLC programmingCapable of performing troubleshooting independentlyRequirements Degree in Engineering or related fields (Automation, Electrical/Electronics, Control System)2 years of relevant experience in PLC and SCADA application, networking setup, instruments and troubleshooting in hardware.Experience in Control System Design including system architecture, hardware and system software.Knowledge in PLCs such as ABB, Schneider and Omron PLC is preferred.Knowledge of SCADA such as Ignition and Wonderware Intouch is preferredKnowledge of standard Communication protocols such as Modbus, Profibus, RS422, RS485, Modbus TCP, NMEA.Knowledge in Python and Restful programmingExperience in Site Testing and commissioning with userExperience in System Training and System OM DocumentationKnowledge in Machine Learning and Data Analytics application will advantageous

title: Senior Software Engineer (Web and Hybrid Mobile App)
description: We are looking for an experienced Front End Developer with hybrid mobile app development experienceResponsibilities  Play key developer and software architect roles. Understanding of code quality measurements and able to implement efficient Unit Tests.  Experienced in designing high quality solutions using OOP, TDD/BDD, Design Patterns and SOLID principles  Experienced in relational database technologies e.g., SQL Server, Oracle  Experienced in Linux, source code control tools (e.g., GIT, SVN)  Experienced in CI/CD tools (e.g., Jenkins, SonarQube)  Good interpersonal skills, analytical mind, get things done attitude, and passion for engineering excellence  Ability to analyze several possible decisions of engineering problem and evaluate which one is better suited. title: Senior/Lead Full Stack Software Engineer
description: About XanPoolXanpool is a global payments and liquidity network providing access to users through local peer to peer payment methods. Rather than depending on a closed network of banks, our open network is made up of individuals and businesses, whose idle capital we use to settle cross-currency and cryptocurrency transactions.In Q3 2021, we closed a US$27 million Series A funding round led by Valar Ventures, and we’re currently looking to double our team to over 150 members by the end of Q2 2022.Being a full-stack engineer at XanPoolYou will be in a cross functional team helping us connect all sub-systems together.You will architect efficient and reusable front-end components, packages that power complex web applications as well design and scale backend systems.The opportunityA perfect role if you want to be a T shape engineer and understand the systems E2E.You among other experienced engineers will be mentoring and bringing the latest practice to the company.You will be helping us create a constant learning culture within a company that will affect hundreds of people.Requirements  More than 5 years of experience as a engineer with the focus on frontend  Strong JavaScript/HTML/CSS frontend engineering experience and deep understanding of the underlying design philosophy and implementation of ReactJS  Experienced in functional programming  OOP  Experience either leading a team, doing code reviews or mentoring people  Extensive experience on backend using either GoLang, Java, Scala, C# or NodeJS  Understanding pros  cons of microservicesYou will love our team ifYou're passionate about software engineering just as us, constantly read books, follow influential people in the industry. You are open to giving and receiving feedback.Our frontend stackTypescript, NodeJS, Inversify, ExpressJS, TypeGraphQL, MongoDB, Redis, RabbitMQ, Docker, AWS ECS, Jest, ElasticSearch, gRpc, Lerna, nginx, Jest, Lerna, Antd, Styled components, PostCSS, SSR, StoryBook, GraphQL, Rest API, Redux(in older codebases).Benefits  Cozy office in downtown of Singapore with a ping pong table  Employment stock options  21 days annual leave  Annual 1 month work from anywhere policy  Company MacBook pro  The environment to thrive and grow  Weekly company lunch on Wednesdays  Engineering book club on Mondays  Medical insurance  Discounts on XanPool

title: Software Engineer
description: ABOUT THE TEAMThe First Party Apps team is responsible for the creation of products and solutions for all the customers that have accounts. Today we work alongside the Customer Experience team, focusing on the customer’s needs and the right experience on our platform. We are looking for an engineer that can create solutions ranging from e-commerce to physical store solutions, but also extend to financial services and even tools that empower partners and clients. Our stack consists mostly of .NET for CPU-bound applications, Node.js + Typescript for IO-bound services, and a pinch of Golang here and there. On the front-end, we leverage React stuffed with Typescript and served with GraphQL on the side.ABOUT THE ROLEWe are looking for someone who will be responsible for providing technical guidance to our different partners, guaranteeing the correct usage of APIs and IO, considering the best architecture in terms of business impact. The objective is to co-create with the partner the right experience, focusing on their success and helping identify product issues and opportunities, gathering partner feedback as insights into the product evolution.WHO YOU ARE:  You have experience working with engineering;  Digital commerce experience;  You have a tech  math mindset, providing simple solutions to complex problems;  You have advanced English knowledge (preferred).As an engineer who builds our front-end first-party apps:  You have experience defining and implementing standards and frameworks;  You have the ability to profile and optimize components performance focusing on improving UX;  You have experience working with a mobile-first approach;As an engineer who builds our back-end first-party apps, you'll need to:  Have experience evolving in large-scale and resilient microservices with 24/7 uptime;  Have experience with design and building low-latency and highly available APIs;Even though we value familiarity with our technology stack, we don't require that you have any previous knowledge of it. We’ve found that people who have a solid grasp of fundamental software engineering skills combined with a growth mindset fit in well - and all the people we've found matching this profile are proficient in at least one programming stack.Interested? Please apply.EA # R2094557Agency License No.: 11C4388

title: Senior software engineer / tech lead
description: Singapore-based pre-seed stage health-tech startup with proven traction seeks passionate software engineer to help pioneer e-commerce for healthcare (H-commerce).Job OverviewWe are looking for a highly motivated individual who is experienced at designing complex IT architecture that is scalable. You should be able to do so in one-third of the time most competent people think possible. Understanding predictive technologies and artificial intelligence is beneficial. Familiarity with front-end development and UX/UI would be helpful, but not necessary. You should have a BS or MS in computer science or any related qualifications, or have the confidence to match up these qualifications.We are a progressive startup who values openness and great ideas. We embrace remote working. Expect to be working with a global team of diverse individuals who are responsible and driven.BackgroundCloud Health is building APAC digital experience for personal health management, including chronic health and self-care. We are engineering novel ways to provide affordable and convenient healthcare to individuals who are proactive and independent. Sire - our main product offering - provides subscription-based prescriptions for men to rekindle their confidence and relationships by legitimizing the convenience of men’s sexual health.Responsibilities for software engineer / tech lead  Design new technology from working prototypes through lean startup methodology  Develop an IT infrastructure that would scale with company’s expansion as a digital health provider  Design IT architectures compatible with predictive technology that enables safe and responsible healthcare  Ability to integrate technical resources in a creative manner that reduces complexity and allow efficient deployment  Select, build and lead a team of developers  Collaborate with other core functions such as marketing and healthcare team - To build what customers really need  Work alongside with founder and core team to shape the future of the companyQualities we are looking for  Strong technical skills with broad experience in various languages and platforms  Progessive thinker with awareness of technological trends  Highly adaptable, resourceful and creative. Believes that everything can be done better  Good management skills, including leading stand-ups, scheduling and prioritizing  Confident working remotely and utilizing collaborative tools such as Google Docs, Slack, Asana  Proven record of innovation is beneficial  BS or MS in computer science or any related qualifications, or have the confidence to match up these qualifications  Has a dream that he/she will change the world  Like petsRemuneration will be discussed, alongside meaningful equity ownershipWe are an equal opportunity employerSend your resume / cover letter to jobs@thesire.sg. You may include your references to your past work. Academic thesis are welcome.

title: Software Engineer
description: As a Junior Software Engineer at Stripe you'll be helping increase the GDP of the internet. This has many hard and interesting challenges which require novel solutions. What is the best developer experience for making payments? How do you balance API versioning while keeping changes fast? How do you build an API generic enough for any marketplace while still being simple?Here are some past projects by your fellow new grads:  Analyzing how much of a negative balance each merchant should be able to hold. Too much and Stripe runs a risk of fraud, too little and it impacts merchant operations.  Bundling Tax and Shipping costs into a charge flow in a simple and intuitive manner.  Allowing merchants to give granular permissions to different users of their business. At a big company, the CFO shouldn't be making API calls nor should an engineer be accidentally actioning disputes.  Shipping Stripe to more countries and payment mechanisms (did you know there are  100 ways to pay in the world?)Engineering at StripeA core part of our engineering culture is inclusiveness: we want to accommodate people from all backgrounds and walks of life.We believe in end-to-end ownership of projects. For any given project, we have one person on point. While they don't necessarily have to do all the work themselves, it's their job to make sure all the work gets done.We launch betas and prototypes as early as we can. (The first version of Stripe, for example, had a beta user since the time we could literally only charge a credit card—we couldn’t even pay out those charges!) This helps ensure that we're building what users actually want.We contribute back to the community, often by building things we think are cool and by releasing open-source software.Our shipping culture How we recruit Guide to the onsite interview (PDF)Teams at StripeRather than adopting extreme models of "horizontal" teams oriented around technologies (a web team, a platform team, etc.) or "vertical" teams oriented around business goals (a revenue team), we pick and choose the parts we like about both models for our teams.Our "vertical" teams (Checkout, Ops, Product, and Risk) can operate independently, building the technology that they need to operate. Each one may not have deep expertise in every part of the stack, but they have enough that things can get done without blocking on other teams.Our "horizontal" teams (Data, Dev tools, Internal tools, Security, Sys) provide support to the others and have deeper expertise on particular parts of the stack. It's their job to build platforms that are so good the other teams want to use them, rather than being forced into it.Teams at Stripe are relatively fluid. Some people stay on a given team for a handful of months, while others seem to prefer sticking to their team permanently. Once you join, we'll work with you to choose a team to get started with—it's all pretty flexible.Stripe's engineering challengesYou should include these in your application:  Links to online profiles you use (GitHub, Twitter, etc).  A description of your work history (whether as a resume, LinkedIn profile, or prose).If there are teams you'd be particularly interested in working on, please let us know (and tell us why!). This way we can have you interview with the people you'll likely work best with. This won't bind you to a specific team—we can figure that out together as the we learn more about your interests and strengths.
